summary: AN ORDINANCE repealing Sections 69, 70, 71, 72, 73, 74, 75, 76, 77, 78, 78-A, 78-B, 78-C, 78-D, 78-E, 79, 80, 82, 83-A and 83-B of the License Code (Ordinance 48022) and Ordinances 63219, 80322, 85943 and 96064 relating to the Licensing and Regulation of Public Dance Halls and Teenage Dances.
